quest.name: Religious Freedom
journal: Gerbert longs for the days when statues of Rhalgr dotted the Peaks.
objectives: Examine the statues at the designated locations.

dialogue.name: GERBERT
dialogue.text: Ah, good to see you again. Pleased to say those rats have not bothered me since you scared them off.

dialogue.name: GERBERT
dialogue.text: In fact, could I ask for your help once more?

dialogue.name: GERBERT
dialogue.text: The Peaks used to be filled with more Rhalgr statues than you could shake a stick at. Of course, the Empire did not approve of this and ordered them all to be destroyed.

dialogue.name: GERBERT
dialogue.text: Though as luck would have it, I have heard two survived. The only issue is the bridges that used to lead to them have fallen into disrepair. Hence why I have been unable to check them myself. Please search for them in my place.

dialogue.name: GERBERT
dialogue.text: I have marked both their locations on your map. Good luck!

dialogue.name: GERBERT
dialogue.text: I have marked the locations of both Rhalgr statues on your map. Good luck!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The statue is missing two key components: an arm and its head.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: This statue has also seen better days.

dialogue.name: GERBERT
dialogue.text: Oh, that is truly a shame. I suppose it was foolish of me to get my hopes up.

dialogue.name: GERBERT
dialogue.text: The monks belonging to the Fist of Rhalgr and the religion's followers used to go on pilgrimages often to compare the different statues.

dialogue.name: GERBERT
dialogue.text: No matter how long it takes, I will make sure the statues are reconstructed. I will not stand back and watch as this tradition dies.

dialogue.name: GERBERT
dialogue.text: My thanks for taking on such a difficult task. Here, take this as your payment.
